rooms.description: Welcome area with Vastu-compliant positioning. A small reception area that leads to the main living areas.
Spacious living room designed with Chettinad style aesthetics; features comfortable seating, ambient lighting and decorative motifs. Vastu-aligned for positive energy.
Modern kitchen with local finishes and integrated storage; designed for joint family usage with ample space for cooking and dining.
Dedicated dining area adjacent to the living room and kitchen, facilitating communal meals. Vastu-aligned placement for family unity.
Dedicated home office with natural light from an east-facing window, ensuring productivity and adherence to Vastu principles.

openings.description: Grand entrance door positioned on the north side for optimal energy flow as per Vastu guidelines.
Balcony opening leading to a balcony attached to each bedroom; designed with safety rails and Chettinad decorative elements.
Multiple windows placed strategically for natural light and ventilation, ensuring adherence to Vastu principles.
